com.jbirdvegas.mgerrit.database

Class DatabaseTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbirdvegas.mgerrit.database.DatabaseTable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Changes, CommitMarker, Config, FileChanges, FileInfoTable, MessageInfo, MoreChanges, ProjectsTable, Reviewers, Revisions, SelectedChange, SyncTime, UserChanges, UserMessage, UserReviewers, Users

    public abstract class DatabaseTable
extends Object
    Base class using reflection to get fields out of the database. This class defines a contract that implementing classes must obey. Note that there are (constant) static fields that implementing classes MUST provide (see below).
